title: [Large-Scale] Podcast-Enhanced Blended Learning Program for Nursing Managers: Strengthening Healthcare Organizational Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory, practical experience, understanding of hierarchical structures and protocols within healthcare organizations.
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment for nursing managers in enterprises to strengthen job competencies. It supports flexible learning using personal devices (BYOD) and incorporates content reflecting real-world medical scenarios (patient rights protection, medical ethical dilemmas).

learning_goals: Learners can explain core nursing management theories (medical organization structure, patient safety protocols, leadership models) via podcasts with ≥80% comprehension.
Learners can integrate podcasts and online resources to propose 3 strategies applicable to real-world nursing challenges (interprofessional conflicts, resource allocation, infection control).
Learners can demonstrate ≥75% achievement in formative assessments to validate podcast-based learning efficacy and propose improvements for medical team collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
